text: Kristen Lee McDonald Rivet (born July 11, 1970) is an American Democratic politician who has been a member of the United States House of Representatives from since 2025. She was a member of the Michigan Senate for the 35th district from 2023 to 2025. ==References== ==Other websites== * Campaign website * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Kristen McDonald Rivet
